derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: from French apéritif, from medieval Latin aperitivus, based on Latin aperire 'to open'

entry.def: An aperitif is an alcoholic drink that you have before a meal.

example.ex: ...a garden terrace where you can drink your aperitifs.
example.tran: 可用来餐前小酌的花园露台

means.word_mean: 1. taken before a meal as an appetizer
